name: atom-menu-bar

0.2.4.name: atom-menu-bar
0.2.4.description: Adds a menu bar to the top of the atom window.

layout.title: Menu Bar Layout
layout.description: This is a JSON/CSON string that dicates the bar. After editing, run "Atom Menu Bar: Register". Consider entering in your config.cson as it supports multiline.

0.1.1.name: atom-menu-bar
0.1.1.description: Adds a menu bar to the top of the atom window.

0.1.0.name: atom-menu-bar
0.1.0.description: Adds a menu bar to the top of the atom window.

readme:
# atom-menu-bar package

Adds a menu bar to the top of the atom window.

![Screenshot](/assets/menubar.png)

metadata.name: atom-menu-bar
metadata.description: Adds a menu bar to the top of the atom window.

layout.title: Menu Bar Layout
layout.description: This is a JSON/CSON string that dicates the bar. After editing, run "Atom Menu Bar: Register". Consider entering in your config.cson as it supports multiline.
